synopsis.text:
Normally just an average fourth-grader with a love for video games, Lamune's life takes an extraordinary turn when he purchases a game from a mysterious peddler girl. Upon beating the game, 'King Sccasher', the peddler girl reveals herself as Princess Milk and emerges from his TV screen, whisking him away to the fantastical Hara-Hara World. Here, Lamune learns that he is the descendant of the legendary hero, Lamuness, destined to revive the Guardian Knights and protect the world from the evil Don Harumage and his minions.

In this vibrant new world, Lamune discovers Tama-Q, a robot advisor who aids him in unlocking the shrines and reviving the free-thinking Guardian Knights. Tama-Q, when fed a coin, releases a capsule containing a Knight, with the exception of King Sccasher, which Lamune pilots himself. As Lamune and his newfound allies face off against Don Harumage and his henchmen, Da Cider and Lesuka, they embark on an epic adventure filled with giant robots, friendship, and pun-filled humor. Will Lamune and his team of Guardian Knights be able to save Hara-Hara World from the clutches of evil? Join them on their thrilling journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
